Mom notes that "one time" doesn't mean just once , but that he did it at least once . Mark uses these things for sometime ago , not now , now , yesterday , last night , for not now . Then he'll go ahead and tell you what his dreamed or thought or did . It could be two weeks ago , but but he'll use anything to show that it was in the past . He'll use "one one time" to suggest a non-specific occurance , and doesn't mean one , one , specifically .
